title: Pat Murphy (rugby union)
text:
Peter James Benjamin "Pat" Murphy (circa 1878 – circa 1945) was a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who represented <a href="Australia">Australia</a>.
Murphy, a <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a>, was born in and claimed a total of 9 international rugby caps for Australia. His brother <a href="William%20Murphy%20%28rugby%20union%29">William</a> was also an <a href="Australia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Australian rugby union representative</a> player.
References.
